 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1929&user=10620> 	

Antonio Corso has taken on a new role within our Group as Vice President, Corporate Finance & Development, reporting directly to Tracey Griffin, Chief of Finance.

In his new role, Antonio will lead our centralized Corporate Finance function supporting Group, Managed Companies, Joint Ventures, and Investments. This role will play a key role in shaping the Group’s financial strategy and capital allocation. 


Antonio joined Chalhoub Group in 2022, bringing extensive international experience across finance, retail, and business development. Since then, he has held several key roles within the Finance and Operations division, consistently driving financial efficiency and operational excellence.

We would like to thank Antonio for his efforts and leadership during his tenure as VP- Finance, Joint Ventures and wish him the best of luck in his new role.

François Monet joins our Group as VP Finance for Joint Ventures, end-to-end Watches, Jewelry & Eyewear, and Luxury Tech categories, reporting to Jasmina Banda, President of Joint Ventures. 


François brings over 20 years of international finance leadership experience, with a career built across some of the world’s most renowned luxury houses. Originally from France, he has lived and worked across Europe and the Middle East, bringing both a global outlook and a deep appreciation for regional dynamics. 

He joins us from Richemont, where he most recently served as CFO of Baume & Mercier, playing a pivotal role in turning around the business and delivering its strongest EBITDA in 17 years.
